details:
noun
- an illusory feat
= synonyms: magic trick
- a cunning or deceitful action or device
= example: a cunning or deceitful action or device
= synonyms: fast one
- a ludicrous or grotesque act done for fun and amusement
= synonyms: antic, joke, prank, caper, put-on
- an attempt to get you to do something foolish or imprudent
= example: an attempt to get you to do something foolish or imprudent
- (card games) in a single round, the sequence of cards played by all the players
- a prostitute's customer
= synonyms: john, whoremaster, whoremonger
- a period of work or duty
verb
- deceive somebody
= example: deceive somebody
= synonyms: fox, fob, flim-flam, play a joke on, play tricks, pull a fast one on, play a trick on
